Emo2 Vec embedding matrix and the CNN mo.from sentence:
Pre-training Emo2Vec
Emo2 Vec embedding matrix and the CNN model are pre-trained using hashtag corpus alone .

Adam.from sentence: Parameters of T and CNN are randomly initialized and Adam is used for optimization .

1024 filters.from sentence: For the best model , we use the batch size of 16 , embedding size of 100 , 1024 filters and filter sizes are 1 , 3 ,5 and 7 respectively .

our parameters.from sentence:
Multi - task training
We tune our parameters of learning rate , L2 regularization , whether to pre-train our model and batch size with the average accuracy of the development set of all datasets .

early stop.from sentence: We early stop our model when the averaged dev accuracy stop increasing .

best model.from sentence: Our best model uses learning rate of 0.001 , L2 regularization of 1.0 , batch size of 32 .
We save the best model and take the embedding layer as Emo2Vec vectors .
